mapper.sql: ID, STUDENT_CODE, NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, ID_CARD, AGE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, IS_CPC, REG_TIME

mapper.update:
update HLW_STUDENT
STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE2 = #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_CPC = #{isCpc,jdbcType=TINYINT},
REG_TIME = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update HLW_STUDENT set STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE2 = #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_CPC = #{isCpc,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REG_TIME = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, STUDENT_CODE, NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, ID_CARD, AGE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, IS_CPC, REG_TIME from HLW_STUDENT
